issue.title: Re-establish compatibility between simulated and real Atlas

content.raw: We want to work on this within the next 4 weeks. We can adjust project schedule a little bit, so if you say you´ll have something in 2 weeks that would be useful. If you think it will take at least a month, we´ll use a unrelated other solution in the meantime.
content.html: We want to work on this within the next 4 weeks. We can adjust project schedule a little bit, so if you say you´ll have something in 2 weeks that would be useful. If you think it will take at least a month, we´ll use a unrelated other solution in the meantime.
